description: A Flutter application main source file defining the app's entry point, main widget (MyApp), and a stateful homepage widget (MyHomePage) displaying a loading message.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application defining the app's theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen with a dynamic title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, builds the scaffold with an app bar and a centered loading message.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The application entry point that runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and MyHomePage, rendering the UI.
